Class Validator

java.lang.Object
controller.Validator
public class Validator extends Object
Class responsible for validating input and output data in the application.

This class handles validations for:

  • Bets and minimum balances
  • Client balances and game money pools
  • Client information (name, age)

Since:
3.0
Author:
Davitroon

  • Method Details

    • validateBet

      public void validateBet(String betTxt, double clientBalance, double gameMoney) throws BetException
      Validates a bet amount.

      Throws a BetException if the bet is not valid due to format, minimum/maximum limits, or exceeding client/game balances.

      Parameters:
      betTxt - Bet amount as a string.
      clientBalance - The client's current balance.
      gameMoney - The money available in the game.
      Throws:
      BetException - if the bet is invalid.
      Since:
      3.0

    • validateMinimumBalances

      public void validateMinimumBalances(double clientBalance, double gameMoney) throws BetException
      Validates that both the client and the game have sufficient funds to play.
      Parameters:
      clientBalance - The client's balance.
      gameMoney - The money available in the game.
      Throws:
      BetException - if either balance is below the minimum bet.
      Since:
      3.0

    • validateClientBalance

      public boolean validateClientBalance(String text, JLabel errorMessage)
      Validates a client's balance input.
      Parameters:
      text - Text input representing the client's balance.
      errorMessage - JLabel where any validation error message will be displayed.
      Returns:
      True if the balance is valid, false otherwise.
      Since:
      3.0

    • validateGameMoney

      public boolean validateGameMoney(String text, JLabel errorMessage)
      Validates a game's money pool input.
      Parameters:
      text - Text input representing the game's money pool.
      errorMessage - JLabel where any validation error message will be displayed.
      Returns:
      True if the money pool is valid, false otherwise.
      Since:
      3.0

    • validateName

      public boolean validateName(String text, JLabel errorMessage)
      Validates a client's name.
      Parameters:
      text - Client's name input.
      errorMessage - JLabel where any validation error message will be displayed.
      Returns:
      True if the name is valid (no numbers or special characters, max length), false otherwise.
      Since:
      3.0

    • validateClientAge

      public boolean validateClientAge(String text, JLabel errorMessage)
      Validates a client's age.
      Parameters:
      text - Client's age input.
      errorMessage - JLabel where any validation error message will be displayed.
      Returns:
      True if the age is valid (between 18 and MAX_AGE), false otherwise.
      Since:
      3.0
